seo.title: Brand Assets | Centrifuge
seo.description: Brand assets, typography, logos, and more for Centrifuge and Altair.

items.title: Primary Colors
items.body: Solid white and yellow are used as the primary brand colors. White are the primary background color and yellow is the primary accent color.

items.title: Secondary colors
items.body: Black is used predominantly as text color and sometimes used as background color. Centrifuge Blue is used as secondary highlight color, in addition to yellow, and on hover states. Centrifuge Yellow is used a secondary highlight color.

font.title: Typeface
font.body: We use Regular weight (400) for body; Medium weight (500), Semibold weight (500), and Bold weight (600) for headlines.

items.title: Wordmark
items.body: Wordmark is the primary logo and is exclusively used either white on black background or black on white background.

items.title: Logomark
items.body: Logomark is only used within the Centrifuge ecosystem when the context is clearly established.

items.title: Spacing
items.body: The logo should be unobstructed or overlayed, seperated from other elements by at least equal to the letter “e” in the logo.

items.title: Improper usage
items.body: The logo should remain in its shade of black or white, without rotation or distortion. There should be no borders around the logo’s respective background color.

items.title: Color Primary
items.body: Solid black and solid white are used as the primary brand colors in text and as background colors.

items.title: Wordmark
items.body: Wordmark is the primary logo and is exclusively used either white on black background or black on white background.

items.title: Logomark
items.body: Logomark is only used as a token symbol or when the context is clearly established within Altair.

items.title: Spacing
items.body: The logo should be unobstructed or overlayed, seperated from other elements by at least equal to 32px.

items.title: Improper usage
items.body: The logo should remain in its original gradient colors, without rotation or distortion. There should be no borders around the logo’s respective background color.
